Bash(FLASK_APP=app python -c "from app import create_app, db; from app.models import Language; app = create_app(); with app.app_context(): print(''Languages in database:''); langs = Language.query.all(); [print(f''  {l.id}: {l.display_name} ({l.code})'') for l in langs]; print(f''Total: {len(langs)} languages'')")

Bash(FLASK_APP=app python -c "
from app import create_app, db
from app.models import Language
app = create_app()
with app.app_context():
    print(''Languages in database:'')
    langs = Language.query.all()
    for l in langs:
        print(f''  {l.id}: {l.display_name} ({l.code})'')
    print(f''Total: {len(langs)} languages'')
")

Bash(FLASK_APP=app python -c "
from app import create_app, db
from app.models import Language
app = create_app()
with app.app_context():
    print(''Languages in database:'')
    langs = Language.query.limit(5).all()
    for l in langs:
        print(f''  {l.id}: {l.display_name} ({l.code})'')
    total = Language.query.count()
    print(f''Total: {total} languages'')
")
